issue.title: panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

issue.body:
Running Syncthing on Raspberry PI (arm-v6 v0.9.10) with connected nodes using Windows (2x x64 v0.9.10) and Android (arm-v7, v0.9.9).
I was setting up additional nodes and repositories so it is hard to pinpoint what caused the crash. I noticed it too late... I hope the panic strace is enough because I cannot (easily?) replicate the problem.
